author: EW.com
title: Courteney Cox binge-watched Friends during quarantine: 'It's really good'
description: She also went head-to-head with a Friends superfan to see who knew more trivia about the show, during Jimmy Kimmel Live's at-home episode.
content:
Courteney Cox is the first to say she would fail at Friends trivia — but the actress is trying to fix that, now that there's plenty of time to watch television during the quarantine.
Appearing on Jimmy Kimmel Live!'s at-home YouTube show on Wednesday, Cox re… [+2654 chars]
